thread.title: Abraaj Halts Investment Activities at Fund-Management Business

author: William Louch
title: Abraaj Halts Investment Activities at Fund-Management Business
text:
Abraaj Group, a Dubai-based private-equity firm involved in an investigation by its investors into claims of missing funds, said Friday it is temporarily suspending all investment activities at its main private-equity business and that its founder is stepping down as chief executive of the unit.
